name: 3D UI, Cards & Character Attempts
description:
Assets I managed to come up with, consisting of:

  • Anime Glasses, specifically Kamina and Shiroe (for anyone who knows)
    • Note: Their materials won't work fully right in the gltf, so I've included the .blend and will be trying to get a working version at least for Godot if i can.
  • 5 Semi finished 3D Button Themes (in a gltf for accessibility/speed due to render time)
    • Note: Most are in greyscale, that I remembered, to allow you to tweak the colors easier without having to edit in the .blend.
  • A procedural trading card in Blender Geometry nodes, requires Blender to tweak/use unfortunately.
  • A few random assets
    • Some character attempts, mostly unfinished but some partially rigged.  Yugi and Natsu specifically.  
    • A quick Zeppelin boat (no idea why, but rabbit holes so why not)
    • And a random Chaos Emerald.

Relatively random, but some of it should be useful generally, the procedural trading game especially if anyone wants it.   As as hopefully the UI, there are some interesting themes.
